class engine.engine.Engine

main class for the engine

creates a scene :param sceneid: :param sceneareas: :return:

get_config()

returns the engine configuration loaded at the engine startup :return:

get_data(datapath)

gets data from the datamanager. if the data file was not loaded, it will load it automatically :param datapath: :return:

get_scene(sceneid)

returns scene with scene id :param sceneid: :return:

log(logtype, *texts)

creates a log message :param logtype: log type for the message: info, warning or error :param texts: different texts to be logged :return:

run(configfilepath=None)

The run function is to be called at startup :param configfilepath: :return:

set_logger(logspath=None)

inits the logger :param logspath: log path. By default it will be in the current working directory :return:

class engine.gameobjects.Scene(*args, **kwargs)

class for creating a Scene. Each Scene can have several Scene Areas, controlling a part of the diplay.

activate()

Activates the scene. Loads all scene areas in the scene :return:

create_scenearea(sceneareid: str, pos: tuple, size: tuple)

creates a new secneArea in the scene :param sceneareid: :param pos: :param size: :return:

e_deactivate()

Deactivates the scene. Unloads all scene areas in the scene :return:

SceneArea class.

create_surface(surf_type: str, pos: tuple, *args, **kwargs)

creates a new surface in the scene area of type ‘surf_type’. :param surf_type: surface type to be creates :param pos: position of the surface in the scene area :param args: :param kwargs: :return:

set_pos(pos: tuple)

set_size(size)

class engine.gameobjects.SceneAreaObject(*args, **kwargs)
class engine.gameentity.GameEntity(*args, **kwargs)

Base class of all game entities. Each game entity as access to the engine. If the Engine was not initialized, no objects will be created. Each game entity has an automatic distributed ID. Each entity is added in a dictionary with their entity id.

classmethod set_name(name)

Sets the name of the class for the engine

classmethod set_subclasses()

Gets all the classes that inherits from class. This function can be called in

set_update(value: bool)

if value is true, the entity is added to the engine update list :param value: :return:
